data.title: Australasian Railway Association (ARA)
data.meta_description: The ARA's new research report looks at the benefits of light rail, compared to heavy rail, bus replacement technology and trackless trams
data.text:
ARA Strategic Plan2022-2025

Our new strategic plan will guide our work to advance the issues that matter to our members and industry

View more

The Future of Freight

The Australasian Railway Association (ARA), Freight on Rail Group (FORG) and Department of Infrastructure, Transport, Regional Development, Communications and the Arts have joined forces to deliver a landmark research project that identifies the barriers and provides solutions to increasing railâ€™s mode share of freight.

Read More

We are the peak body for the rail sector in Australia and New Zealand.

We represent more than 230 member organisations including passenger and freight operators, track owners and managers, suppliers, manufacturers, contractors and consultants. Members include listed and private rail-related companies, government agencies and franchisees.
